appearances.title: Laura Coates Live : CNNW : January 13, 2026 8:00pm-9:00pm PST
appearances.snippet: jared moskowitz, are pointing out comer's hypocrisy as two of the congressmen standing behind him, andy biggs and scott perry. well, both defied congressional subpoenas themselves from the house january 6th committee in 2022. remember that? joining me now, cnn legal analyst and former federal prosecutor eliot williams. okay, we have a game of legal chicken going on right now. the clintons saying they don't have to follow because it's an invalid subpoena. it doesn't have a legislative purpose. and they are seeking testimony not connected to a federal investigation. is that enough? >> it technically, by the letter of the law, it's enough for them to get out of it. but we'll see what happens in the courts now that no valid legislative purpose language is very important in congressional oversight. i dealt with it when i worked on the hill and at the justice department. congress can engage in oversight of pretty much anything it wants of the federal government or of industry or whatever else. if they have what is called a valid legislative purpose. now, that doesn't have to be just for passing a l

appearances.snippet: coercion and sexual abuse free environment act, introduced by my colleague and friend, chairman andy biggs. this bill will ensure accountability for anyone who intentionally compels a minor to engage in self-harm or other degrading acts. as child abuse continues in this country and takes many forms, prosecutors must have the proper tools to go after these predators. i urge my colleagues to support the coercion and sexual abuse free environment act. and with that, madam speaker, i yield back. >> i reserve and i'm prepared to close. >> the gentleman reserves. and the gentleman from maryland is recognized. >> all right. so we've got no further speakers, madam speaker. and we just want to restate our strong support for the legislation. and i want to thank the distinguished gentleman for arizona for bringing it forward. it's certainly a lot more fun to be with him on that legislation than against him on legislation. and i'm delighted we were able to work on this bipartisan bill together. >> gentleman yields back. >> we yield back. >> the gentleman yields back. and the gentleman from arizona is
